title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Week 7 O Explosion, Browns D
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Week 7 O Explosion, Browns D
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why Russell Westbrook’s decline with the Lakers has been so dramatic, why LeBron isn’t equipped to hold Westbrook accountable, how the NCAA is finally putting guardrails up with the NIL, and why he’s not bothered by Aaron Rodgers publicly calling out his receivers.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin to discuss if he had a hunch the Cincy offense was set for a huge day against the Falcons in Week 7 (15:00), how defenses have adapted their game plan over 7 weeks (21:00), what rule he would change if he was Commish (24:00), if it’s been hard to go dark on social media (25:00), his relationship with Browns CB Denzel Ward (27:00), how he's preparing for for Myles Garrett and the Browns defense (29:00), which opposing teams alternate uniforms he likes (2nd to the Bengals all whites) (35:00), why he's not a yeller in the mold of Tom Brady (38:00), how he's developed great communication with Ja'Marr Chase even when he wants more touches (41:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates, check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action, and visit Cuts for the latest Fall fits! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
